message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.NE 

The paper discusses a machine learning approach to tackle class imbalance in classification tasks by building resampling recommendation systems. This falls under the domain of machine learning and artificial intelligence, which are covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Specifically, the paper focuses on meta-learning, which is a subfield of machine learning concerned with learning how to learn. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) since these sub-categories are closely related to the topic of the paper. Additionally, since the paper deals with resampling methods, which are commonly used in data science, the sub-categories cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) are also likely.
